name: cardiac-arrest-react
description: An app that connects to Strava via auth0 and google maps to get a list of the highest rated hills in the google maps viewport

scripts.start: concurrently "cd api/ && npm run watch" "cd client/ && npm start"
scripts.install: cd api/ && npm install --force && cd ../client/ && npm install --force

author: Danila Popov, Diana Cady, Ben Savage, George Pastushok
